text: The requirement for protein 3a IC activity in vivo was also studied by measuring the titers of 3a IC mutants in the lungs of infected BALB/c mice at 2 and 4 dpi (Fig. 5B ). Peak titers were reached at 2 dpi and had decreased by around 1 log unit at 4 dpi in all cases. Every mutant showed replication levels similar to those seen with the wt strain (around 1 ϫ 10 7 PFU/g of lung tissue at 2 dpi and 4 ϫ 10 6 PFU/g at 4 dpi), with the exception
